page.title: 01OUR DOMESDAY BLOCK
page.content: The area in which we live is mostly rural. There are a few villages like Twechar & Queenzieburn which surround the small market town of Kilsyth. Long ago Kilsyth was known as Monieburgh but it's name was changed when a castle was built on the site of an ancient chapel in the 16th century . Most of the local farmers keep cattle ,sheep or pigs and give over their land to rough grazing or the growing of animal food. People here have to travel outside the area for work ,leisure and shopping but a great deal is going on to improve the facilities. A disused quarry has been transformed into an attractive leisure park, the centre of Kilsyth is being modernised, bothshops and houses and there is to be a leisure park along the canal.
